00024 #ifndef __MT_ABSTRACT_TIED_THREAD_POOL_H__
00025 #define __MT_ABSTRACT_TIED_THREAD_POOL_H__
00026 
00027 #include "mt/AbstractThreadPool.h"
00028 #include "mt/TiedWorkerThread.h"
00029 #include "mt/CPUAffinityInitializer.h"
00030 
00031 namespace mt
00032 {
00033 template <typename Request_T>
00034 class AbstractTiedThreadPool : public AbstractThreadPool<Request_T>
00035 {
00036 
00037 public:
00038         AbstractTiedThreadPool(unsigned short numThreads = 0) : AbstractThreadPool<Request_T>(numThreads) {}
00039 
00040         virtual ~AbstractTiedThreadPool(){}
00041 
00042         virtual void initialize(CPUAffinityInitializer* affinityInit = NULL)
00043         {
00044             mAffinityInit = affinityInit;
00045         }
00046         virtual CPUAffinityThreadInitializer* getCPUAffinityThreadInitializer()
00047         {
00048             CPUAffinityThreadInitializer* threadInit = NULL;
00049             
00050             // If we were passed a schematic 
00051             // for initializing thread affinity...
00052             if (mAffinityInit)
00053             {
00054                 threadInit = mAffinityInit->newThreadInitializer();
00055             }
00056             return threadInit;
00057         }
00058 
00059         virtual mt::WorkerThread<Request_T>* newWorker()
00060         {
00061             return newTiedWorker(&this->mRequestQueue, 
00062                                  getCPUAffinityThreadInitializer());
00063         }
00064 
00065  protected:
00066         virtual mt::TiedWorkerThread<Request_T>* newTiedWorker(mt::RequestQueue<Request_T>* q, 
00067                                                                CPUAffinityThreadInitializer* init) = 0;
00068 
00069 private:
00070         CPUAffinityInitializer* mAffinityInit;
00071 };
00072 
00073 }
00074 #endif
